price: E, por certo, teu Senhor sabe o que seus peitos ocultam, e o que manifestam.
arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تُكِنُّ صُدُورُهُمۡ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna rabbaka layaʿlamu mā tukinnu ṣudūruhum wamā yuʿ'linūna
